page.title: 19Tourism in Gwyddelwern
page.content: In the Gwyddelwern area there is a static Caravan Park and sites for {touring caravans and campers.}The majority of the static caravan owners come from over the border in{England and prefer to stay within this area enjoying the peace & quiet, where as the touring caravaners and campers use Gwyddelwern as a base from which to enjoy North Wales. It is 11 miles from the start of{Snowdonia {National Park,}27 miles from the{Coast and 30 miles from{Chester. There are also Holiday houses for rent and cottages used and owned by people living out of this area. {Bed & Breakfast}is available, mostly in the surrounding countryside in Farm Houses. The main attraction for Tourists is{walking,}although there is {fishing}available in a small man-made lake in the village. Mrs C. White.
